RCT Estimators

Source: R/rct-analysis.R
RCT_estimators.Rd

RCT_estimators is used as a function for RCT_analysis function to provide estimators for RCT analysis

RCT_estimators(
  control_pre_test,
  control_post_test,
  treatment_pre_test,
  treatment_post_test,
  SESOI_lower = 0,
  SESOI_upper = 0,
  na.rm = FALSE
)

Arguments

control_pre_test

Numeric vector containing Control Pre-test observations
control_post_test

Numeric vector containing Control Post-test observations
treatment_pre_test

Numeric vector containing Treatment Pre-test observations
treatment_post_test

Numeric vector containing Treatment Post-test observations
SESOI_lower

Lower smallest effect size of interest threshold
SESOI_upper

Upper smallest effect size of interest threshold
na.rm

Should NAs be removed? Default is FALSE

Value

Named numeric vector

Examples

set.seed(1666)

RCT_estimators(
  control_pre_test = rnorm(20, 100, 10),
  control_post_test = rnorm(20, 105, 10),
  treatment_pre_test = rnorm(20, 100, 10),
  treatment_post_test = rnorm(20, 120, 10),
  SESOI_lower = -5,
  SESOI_upper = 5
)
#>                        SESOI lower                        SESOI upper 
#>                         -5.0000000                          5.0000000 
#>                        SESOI range        Control Group Pre-test mean 
#>                         10.0000000                        102.8294629 
#>          Control Group Pre-test SD       Control Group Post-test mean 
#>                          9.3281144                        105.7057926 
#>         Control Group Post-test SD      Treatment Group Pre-test mean 
#>                          8.7559030                        105.0229491 
#>        Treatment Group Pre-test SD     Treatment Group Post-test mean 
#>                         13.6142924                        123.2754014 
#>       Treatment Group Post-test SD                 Pre-test pooled SD 
#>                         11.5746498                         11.6696760 
#>          Pre-test Group difference         Post-test Group difference 
#>                          2.1934862                         17.5696088 
#>          Control Group Change mean            Control Group Change SD 
#>                          2.8763298                         10.5900885 
#>            Control Group Cohen's d      Control Group Change to SESOI 
#>                          0.2464790                          0.2876330 
#>   Control Group Change SD to SESOI               Control Group pLower 
#>                          1.0590088                          0.2330646 
#>          Control Group pEquivalent              Control Group pHigher 
#>                          0.3453383                          0.4215971 
#>        Treatment Group Change mean          Treatment Group Change SD 
#>                         18.2524524                         19.6781802 
#>          Treatment Group Cohen's d    Treatment Group Change to SESOI 
#>                          1.5640925                          1.8252452 
#> Treatment Group Change SD to SESOI             Treatment Group pLower 
#>                          1.9678180                          0.1259646 
#>        Treatment Group pEquivalent            Treatment Group pHigher

#>                          1.4519352                         15.3761226 
#>                      Random effect         Systematic effect to SESOI
